attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are appalled by the treatment the parents of Madeleine McCann have received from the Portuguese authorities in recent days. It is clear they are becoming more malicious in order to overshadow their own incompetence or corruption. We feel it is the duty of our Government to take whatever action is necessary in order to stop such barbaric treatment of two decent British subjects.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
